post_title: FS: T206 Red Cobb Sov 350 SGC 3
post_content:
For Sale, T206 Red Cobb Sov 350 SGC 3. Very bold, presentable, and desirable HOF rare back. Stunning front/back combo. PM if interested. 

(SENT TO PROBSTEIN, I'll post auction link here when available).
Thanks for looking,
Michael
Bump for price reduction. Send PM if interested.
Final bump (and price reduction) before this card goes to auction. Will pull it tmw (Monday). PM if interested, thanks.

On eBay now, thanks for looking.
